text.name: longdescription
text.text: Pygame is a lightweight and versatile 2D game development framework built on top of Python. Originally released in 2000, it provides an easy-to-use set of modules for creating retro-style games, interactive experiences, and multimedia applications. With a strong community and a focus on simplicity, Pygame makes it easy for beginners and veterans alike to bring their pixel-perfect visions to life, blending coding and creativity in a true spirit of indie development.
